titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2004.

Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 201 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2004.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-129, by Mr. Reynolds.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 49.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 253.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 205 (Roll no. 224).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on May 22, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2 (Jobs and Growth Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2003).
